package frc.robot;

import com.ctre.phoenix6.configs.TalonFXConfiguration;

/**
 * Global constants for subsystems other than swerve.
 *
 * This file coexists with TunerConstants (auto-generated by CTRE)
 * and should not be placed in the "generated" package.
 */
public final class Constants {

    /** Arm subsystem constants for the Hippo Arm project. */
    public static final class Arm {
        /** CAN IDs */
        public static final int ARM_MOTOR_ID = 13; // Kraken X60 on arm
        public static final int ARM_ENCODER_ID = 14; // Through-bore CANcoder on arm shaft

        public static final boolean ARM_MOTOR_INVERTED = false;

        /** Total motor-to-arm gear ratio: 4:1 MaxPlanetary × 3:1 chain = 12:1 */
        public static final double ARM_GEAR_RATIO = 12.0;

        /** Configuration object for the TalonFX controlling the arm. */
        public static final TalonFXConfiguration armConfig = new TalonFXConfiguration();

        static {
            // PID values (initial defaults; can be tuned live on SmartDashboard)
            armConfig.Slot0.kP = 2.0;
            armConfig.Slot0.kI = 0.0;
            armConfig.Slot0.kD = 0.1;

            // Software limits (expressed in motor rotations)
            // 0° arm = 0 rotations; 180° = 0.5 arm revs × 12 = 6 rotations
            armConfig.SoftwareLimitSwitch.ReverseSoftLimitEnable = true;
            armConfig.SoftwareLimitSwitch.ReverseSoftLimitThreshold = 0.0;

            armConfig.SoftwareLimitSwitch.ForwardSoftLimitEnable = true;
            armConfig.SoftwareLimitSwitch.ForwardSoftLimitThreshold = 6.0;
        }
    }

    // Add more subsystem constant groups below (e.g., Elevator, Intake, etc.)
}
